title: A Look At Cybersecurity, Taxes, And The Markets
itunes:title: A Look At Cybersecurity, Taxes, And The Markets
description:
Matt Hayden, VP of GovTech Solutions for Exiger, discusses cybersecurity. Avery Sheffield, Senior PM of Long/Short Equity Hedge Fund Strategy at Rockefeller Asset Management, discusses e-commerce and consumer outlook for brick-and-mortar retail. Bill Smith, National Director of Tax Technical Services for CBIZ MHM's National Tax Office, talks tax legislation. Tom Stringfellow, Chief Investment Strategist at Argent Trust Company, discusses markets. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
